attributes.action: When COVID is controlled/over, give the UK a week long bank holiday to celebrate
attributes.additional_details: Families have been apart for a vast amount of time, loved ones have been lost, NHS and key workers stretched and continued working throughout, certain sectors have been hit hard, the list is endless. We should be able to all come together as a country and celebrate coming out the other side of the pandemic and see loved ones and celebrate with family and friends. A time to reflect and be thankful.
attributes.background: Due to the ongoing pandemic and all the lives lost and families being apart for so long, it would be great for the government to announce a week long bank holiday when we are clear of Covid and or immunised
